alert.note: Alert for Moore (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 10:57AM CDT until June 12 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MOORE COUNTY... At 1056 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Four Way, or 13 miles south of Dumas, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Dumas, Masterson, Four Way and Lake Meredith. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
